Package PDFjet.NET

Interface IDrawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BarCode, BarCode2D, Box, CalendarMonth, Chart, CheckBox, CompositeTextLine, FileAttachment, Form, Image, Line, Path, PlainText, Point, QRCode, RadioButton, Text, TextBlock, TextBox, TextColumn, TextFrame, TextLine, Title
public interface IDrawable
Interface that is required for components that can be drawn on a PDF page as part of Optional Content Group.

  • Method Details

    • DrawOn

      float[] DrawOn(Page page) throws Exception
      Draw the component implementing this interface on the PDF page.
      Parameters:
      page - the page to draw on.
      Returns:
      x and y coordinates of the bottom right corner of this component.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the draw method did not succeed.
